languages.text: {n}Навигатор склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Боюсь, мы, Великий Регент Ааронто, вынуждены отклонить ваше предложение. У Дома Орселлио достаточно своих... проблем. Проблемы союзников нам сейчас некстати".

traits.locale_text: {n}Навигатор склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Боюсь, мы, Великий Регент Ааронто, вынуждены отклонить ваше предложение. У Дома Орселлио достаточно своих... проблем. Боюсь, проблемы союзников нам сейчас некстати".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."
languages.original_text: {n}Навигатор склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Боюсь, мы, Великий Регент Ааронто, вынуждены отклонить ваше предложение. У Дома Орселлио достаточно своих... проблем. Проблемы союзников нам сейчас некстати".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, have to respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has plenty of... problems of its own. I am afraid adding the allies' troubles would be too much of a burden for us right now."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, have to respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has plenty of... problems of its own. I am afraid adding the allies' troubles would be too much of a burden for us right now."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}这位导航者摇了摇头。{/n}“恐怕我们，阿伦托大摄政王，只能谦卑地拒绝您的提议。奥赛罗家族目前有太多……自己的问题要解决。如果还要解决盟友的问题，我担心这对我们目前而言是个过于沉重的负担。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位导航者摇了摇头。{/n}“恐怕我们，阿伦托大摄政王，只能谦卑地拒绝您的提议。奥塞罗家族目前有太多……自己的问题要解决。如果还要解决盟友的问题，我担心这对我们目前而言是个过于沉重的负担。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}El Navegante ladea la cabeza.{/n} «Me temo que yo, el gran regente Aaronto, me veo obligado a rechazar respetuosamente su oferta. La casa Orsellio ya tiene suficientes... problemas propios. Lamentablemente, añadir los problemas de un aliado sería una carga excesiva en este momento».
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Navegante ladea la cabeza.{/n} «Me temo que yo, el gran regente Aaronto, me veo obligado a rechazar respetuosamente su oferta. La casa Orsellio ya tiene suficientes... problemas propios. Lamentablemente, añadir los problemas de un aliado sería una carga excesiva en este momento».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}航宙士は首をかしげる。{/n}「大摂政アーロントの申し出は謹んでお断りする。オーセリオ家には、それだけで十分な…問題がある。同盟の問題をそこに加えることは、現在の我々にとってあまりにも負担になることだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}航宙士は首をかしげる。{/n}「大摂政アーロントの申し出は謹んでお断りする。オーセリオ家には、それだけで十分な…問題がある。同盟の問題をそこに加えることは、現在の我々にとってあまりにも負担になることだろう」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Der Navigator legt den Kopf schief.{/n} "Leider müssen wir, der Große Regent Aaronto, Euer Angebot respektvoll ablehnen. Das Haus Orsellio hat bereits ... genügend eigene Probleme. Ich fürchte, zusätzliche von Verbündeten wären für uns derzeit eine zu große Bürde."
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Navigator legt den Kopf schief.{/n} "Leider müssen wir, der Große Regent Aaronto, Euer Angebot respektvoll ablehnen. Das Haus Orsellio hat bereits ... genügend eigene Probleme. Ich fürchte, zusätzliche von Verbündeten wären für uns derzeit eine zu große Bürde."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Le navigateur penche la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Je crains que nous, vénérable régent Aaronto, ne devions refuser votre offre. La maison Orsellio a déjà bien assez de... problèmes à régler. Nous ne pouvons nous permettre d'y ajouter les problèmes d'un allié. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le navigateur penche la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Je crains que nous, vénérable régent Aaronto, ne devions refuser votre offre. La maison Orsellio a déjà bien assez de... problèmes à régler. Nous ne pouvons nous permettre d'y ajouter les problèmes d'un allié. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Rotacı başını dikleştiriyor.{/n} "Korkarım biz, Yüce Naip Aaronto olarak teklifinizi reddetmek durumundayız. Orsellio Hanesi'nin derdi zaten başından aşkın. Şu an bunların üzerine müttefiklerimizin sorunlarını da eklemek, omuzlarımıza fazla yük yüklemek anlamına gelir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator cocks his head.{/n} "I am afraid we, the Great Regent Aaronto, must respectfully decline your offer. House Orsellio has enough... problems of its own. I am afraid adding allies' troubles would be too great a burden for us at present."

traits.locale_text: {n}Rotacı başını dikleştiriyor.{/n} "Korkarım biz, Yüce Naip Aaronto, teklifinizi reddetmek durumundayız. Orsellio Hanesi'nin sorunları zaten başından aşkın. Şu an bunların üzerine müttefik sorunlarını da eklemek, üzerimize fazla yük yüklemek anlamına gelir."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
